home.description: Challenge yourself with interactive SQL exercises. From SELECT basics to complex queries, build real database skills with immediate and detailed feedback.
home.subtitle: Everything you need to become proficient in SQL, organized and structured for maximum learning.
home.box_1_description: Organized exercises, learn progressively and build confidence.
home.box_2_description: Write real SQL queries and get immediate feedback. Learn by doing, not just watching.
home.box_3_description: Monitor your learning journey. See statistics as you complete exercises.
home.box_4_description: Every exercise comes with feedback to help you understand and improve.
home.third_title: Master SQL through carefully designed laboratories and exercises.
home.box_5_description: Master the basics of SQL queries. Learn SELECT, WHERE, and basic filtering.
home.box_6_description: Explore JOINs and understand how to work with multiple tables.
home.box_7_description: Learn SUM, COUNT, AVG, and GROUP BY for data analysis.
home.box_8_description: Dive into subqueries, and complex aggregations.
home.step_1_description: Create your account and join the other students to learn SQL.
home.step_2_description: Browse the organized laboratories and select one to start learning.
home.step_3_description: Write SQL queries and get instant feedback on your solutions.
home.step_4_description: Review the solutions and progress through the challenges.
